thread.section_title: Spotahome opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Spotahome | www.spotahome.com
thread.title: Ancuta Balan

author: Ancuta Balan
title: Ancuta Balan
text:
Dear representative,
I didn't receive enough details about my booking. In general there were nice persons, but yesterday I have suddenly received the information that I don't have a room in Brussels anymore. It was a mistake, but is this normal for a serious company? I hope that everything else will be fine... But you should pay attention to the clients and their expectations.
